sources.title: Hercules and the Captive Women
sources.description: A sleepy Hercules discovers that Queen Atlantis plans to use her superhuman warriors to take over the world. IMDB page

sources.title: Hercules and the Captive Women
sources.description: This movie is not fully uploaded. To watch this movie in it's entirety, please click the link below. Thank you, and I apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. http://www.archive.org/details/cco__HerculesandtheCaptiveWomen

metadata.Plot: The ever intrepid world-trotting hunk of a man Herc (Hercules to those who are not his friends) saves a beautiful maiden from the hands of an evil creature. She takes him to her home, Atlantis. Herc kicks some butt and saves her from her mother who wants to kill her and from some scary looking blond guys but unfortunately the rest of the inhabitants are destroyed. Do not worry because Herc escapes along with his son, the maiden and an annoying midget.
metadata.Writer: Vittorio Cottafavi, Sandro Continenza, Duccio Tessari
metadata.Actors: Reg Park, Fay Spain, Ettore Manni
